rooms.description: A compact yet inviting entrance with a split-level design approach. Vastu principles applied for positive energy entry.
A spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the West, maximizing natural light and ventilation. Design incorporates brutalist aesthetics with exposed concrete structures.
Dedicated workspace integrated into the studio apartment design. Features minimalistic brutalist detailing and strategic window placement for optimal daylight.
Efficient kitchen space designed with compact brutalist elements and functional storage solutions. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by keeping the cooking area in a positive zone.
A modestly sized bathroom integrated into the studio apartment. Designed with clean lines and functional brutalist features.
